# layout

**Type Property**

A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.

## Declaration

```swift
static var layout: UIView.Invalidations.Layout { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this invalidation type to call [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/setNeedsLayout()] when a change in property value should cause an update to the layout of the containing view’s subviews.

## Specifying invalidation types

- **configuration**: A change that invalidates a view’s configuration.
- **constraints**: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.
- **display**: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.
- **intrinsicContentSize**: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.
